casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. Thomas Jesse LEONARD, Appellant. No. 9174. Circuit Court of Appeals, Third Circuit. Argued Oct. 25, 1946. Decided Nov. 1, 1946. David H. H. Felix, of Philadelphia, Pa., for appellant. Edward Á. Kallick, of Philadelphia, Pa. (Gerald A. Gleeson, U. S. Atty., of Philadelphia, Pa., on the brief), for ap-pellee.

Before BIGGS, ALBERT LEE STEPHEN S, and KALODNER, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

The judgment of conviction is affirmed.
